clinical_study.brief_title: Post-Marketing Surveillance Study of Eribulin on the Status and Factors for the Development of Peripheral Neuropathy in Japan.
clinical_study.official_title: An Observational Post-Marketing Surveillance Study on the Status and Factors for the Development of Peripheral Neuropathy in Patients With HER2-Negative Inoperable or Recurrent Breast Cancer in Japan.

brief_summary.textblock: The primary objective of the study is to clarify factors affecting the incidence of peripheral neuropathy in patients treated with HALAVEN. A total of 590 patients will be enrolled in this study with 295 patients in the treatment group of primary or secondary chemotherapy and 295 patients in the treatment group of tertiary or later chemotherapy.

primary_outcome.measure: Number of participants with adverse events and serious adverse events
primary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline and up to 2 years after the initial dose of HALAVEN

primary_outcome.measure: Number of participants with peripheral neuropathy
primary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline, and every two months after the initial dose of HALAVEN up to 2 years
primary_outcome.description: Common Terminology Criteria for Adverse Events (CTCAE) grade of peripheral neuropathy is assessed at baseline, and every two months after the initial dose of HALAVEN up to 2 years.

primary_outcome.measure: Number of participants with adverse drug reactions
primary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline and up to 2 years after the initial dose of HALAVEN

primary_outcome.measure: Time to onset of peripheral neuropathy
primary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline and up to 2 years after the initial dose of HALAVEN

primary_outcome.measure: Time to resolution of peripheral neuropathy
primary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline and up to 2 years after the initial dose of HALAVEN

arm_group.arm_group_label: HALAVEN treatment group of primary or secondary chemotherapy
arm_group.description: Patients with HER2-negative recurrent breast cancer who have received 0 or 1 chemotherapy regimen for recurrent breast cancer.

arm_group.arm_group_label: HALAVEN treatment group of tertiary or later chemotherapy
arm_group.description: Patients with HER2-negative inoperable or recurrent breast cancer who have received 2 or more chemotherapy regimens for inoperable or recurrent breast cancer.

study_pop.textblock: HER2-negative subjects who are treated with HALAVEN for the first time.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion criteria:
Patients with HER2-negative inoperable or recurrent breast cancer.
Exclusion criteria:
Patients with high-grade bone marrow depression (absolute neutrophil count less than 1,000 /mm^3, absolute platelet count less than 75,000 /mm^3).
Patients with a history of hypersensitivity to the ingredients of HALAVEN. Women who are pregnant or may be pregnant. Patients with a history of use of HALAVEN.

clinical_study.keyword: HER2-Negative Inoperable or Recurrent Breast Cancer
